safetyTips: Social distancing measures in place by way of booked time slots and collection only
name: Deal Hoy
description: We are offering our Italian Style Wood Fired Pizzas on a collection only basis on Friday and Saturday evening. Slots will be pre booked via phone or email with allocated collection times. There are also fabulous bundle deals with wine and beer, and a very special “Two Pizzas for £15” offer.
